name: Happy Penguin Egg Rush XD - Extreme Polar Pandemonium Survival Challenge
name_original: Happy Penguin Egg Rush XD - Extreme Polar Pandemonium Survival Challenge
description:
Happy Penguin Egg Rush XD - Extreme Polar Pandemonium Survival Challenge is an arcade game developed by Mekamax. It came out on 28-03-2014. Mekamax published the game.
Happy Penguin Egg Rush XD - Extreme Polar Pandemonium Survival Challenge is available on iOS.
